alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Excessive Heat Warning issued August 31 at 7:42PM MST until August 31 at 8:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... Temperatures in much of Mohave County will cool going into the weekend, allowing the risk of heat-related illnesses to decrease. Heat-sensitive groups and anyone outdoors for extended periods of time should still take precautions from the heat going through this holiday weekend. Excessive Heat Warnings remain in effect for surrounding areas including the Colorado River Valley, southwestern Utah, southern Nevada, and southeastern California through Sunday, but will be allowed to expire tonight for much of Mohave County.
